definition: lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of

sentences.english: A mix of people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 各色人等參加了那個會議。

sentences.english: Colorful umbrellas add to a lively atmosphere in the summer streets.
sentences.chinese: 各色陽傘給夏日待頭平添了活潑的氣氛。

sentences.english: Cross a street in the Marais and you cross centuries and cultures.
sentences.chinese: 穿過瑪萊的街道，你便穿越了世紀及各色文化。

sentences.english: This shop has a good assortment of goods to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 該店各色貨物俱全，任君選擇。

sentences.english: I do like the visual of heroes and villains wearing costumes.
sentences.chinese: 我的確很喜歡看英雄壞蛋們穿着各色的制服。

sentences.english: I want to meet all the people, and see all the sights.
sentences.chinese: 會見各樣的人，觀看各色風景。

sentences.english: This small coat was patched up with pieces of cloth of different colours.
sentences.chinese: 這件小襖兒是用各色花布鬥起來的。

sentences.english: Shadow on both sides of the road trees, colored flowers bloom seasons.
sentences.chinese: 道路的兩旁樹影扶疏，各色鮮花四季盛開。

sentences.english: Any of various plants of the genus Lilium, having variously colored, often trumpet-shaped flowers.
sentences.chinese: 百合一種百合屬植物，開各色，通常爲。

sentences.english: Many city hotels and diversely located motels fall into this group.
sentences.chinese: 許多城市旅館和各色各樣汽車旅館屬於這一類。

sentences.english: Vegetable choices go all the way from artichokes to zucchini.
sentences.chinese: 常喫的蔬菜各色各樣，從洋薊到綠皮密生西葫蘆。

sentences.english: The rubicon separates her form death is comedy.
sentences.chinese: 橫在拍肩俠和死亡之間的是各色喜劇。

sentences.english: It takes all sorts of people to make our world so interesting and colourful.
sentences.chinese: 各色各樣的人使得我們的世界如此有趣和多彩。

sentences.english: The square was bedecked with flags and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 廣場掛滿了各色彩旗和擺滿了鮮花。

sentences.english: In these years, there were too many scammers.
sentences.chinese: 這年頭，各色騙子太多了。

sentences.english: Digitalization has made much of art photography's vast variety possible.
sentences.chinese: 數字化造就了大量各色各樣的藝術攝影。

definition: lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
glittering jewels to delight the eye (idiom)/fig. a dazzling lineup
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
everything that should be here is here (idiom); all one can think of is on hand/to have all one needs
